contentrichtext.text: '''Yading''' is a national level reserve in [[Daocheng County]], in the southwest of [[Sichuan]] Province, [[China]]. Unknown to the outside world until the late 1990s{{Fact|date=February 2009}}, it is a mountain sanctuary and major Tibetan pilgrimage site comprising three peaks sanctified by the [[Lobsang Gyatso, 5th Dalai Lama|5th]] [[Dalai Lama]]. The peaks are seen as [[Emanationism|emanation]]s of the three [[Bodhisattva|boddhisatva]]s [[Avalokitesvara|Chenrezig]], [[Jampayang]] and [[Chenadorje]], with Chenrezig being the highest peak at 6032 meters above sea level. ==External links== * [http://www.chinatrekking.com/destinations/sichuan/yading Travel information on Yading] * [http://www.chinabackpacker.com/old/destinations/sichuan/daocheng/general.htm Travel information for Yading Nature Reserve] {{Tibet-geo-stub}} {{Protected-area-stub}} {{coord|28|22|01|N|100|13|48|E|source:kolossus-frwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Geography of Sichuan]] [[Category:Biosphere reserves of China]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in Sichuan]] [[Category:Nature reserves in China]]
